meta.job_title: Senior Leader, Corporate Financial Planning & Analysis

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the annual budgeting and periodic forecasts including the analysis and testing of assumptions.
Develop domain knowledge of CoreLogic businesses to include an understanding of short-term objectives & long-term strategies for the organization.
Review and support the content of financial communication to internal and external stakeholders including private equity owners, public bondholders, and the board of directors.
Lead, develop and drive high engagement of a team of 3-4 finance professionals.
Provide financial counsel for the development of the strategic plan, product road maps, and growth initiatives.
Direct financial modeling and deal analysis in support of acquisition and divestiture activities.
Maintain broad influence through ongoing development of internal/ external relationships across the organization.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate degree (BA/BS) in finance or accounting. MBA and/or CPA preferred.
